oneOf.description: The type of package repository for this repository. One of: Bower, CPAN, Debian, Rubygems, Godoc, IVY, Maven, NPM, Packagist, Nuget, Pypi, YUM

oneOf.description: nickname used for well known "named" public repos such as: Maven Central, Pypi, RubyGems, npmjs.org or their mirrors
